frontmatter.title: How To Purchase RAM Token (Uniswap V2)
frontmatter.description: This page demonstrates how to buy RAM Token using Uniswap V2. Uniswap is a decentralized exchange in the form of two smart contracts hosted on the Ethereum blockchain.
